abs_volume_set.name: Set absolut volume
abs_volume_set.description: Sets the volume of multiple rooms in a media player's speaker group to the same level.

volume_level.name: Volume
volume_level.description: Volume level to be set as an integer between 1 and 100.

rooms.name: Rooms
rooms.description: Optional: The names of the rooms for which the volume is to be set. If not specified, the volume is set for all rooms in the speaker group.

add_room.name: Add room to group
add_room.description: Add a room to a speaker group.

room.name: Room
room.description: Name of the room to be added to the speaker group.

room_of_group.name: Group member
room_of_group.description: Name of a room member of the target speaker group.

drop_room.name: Drop room from group
drop_room.description: Remove a room from a speaker group.

room.name: Room
room.description: Name of the room to be removed from a speaker group.

room_of_group.name: Group member
room_of_group.description: Optional: Name of a room that is a member of the speaker group. If specified, the room to be removed must be a member of this group.

group.name: Group speakers
group.description: Group rooms into a virtual media player (multi-room).

room_names.name: Rooms
room_names.description: List of room names to be combined in a group. At least one room must be specified.

set_room_volume.name: Set room volume
set_room_volume.description: Set the volume of a room.

room.name: Room
room.description: Name of the room whose volume is to be adjusted.

volume.name: Volume
volume.description: Volume level to be set as an integer between 1 and 100.

snapshot.name: Save a snapshot
snapshot.description: Take a snapshot of the media player.

restore.name: Restore a snapshot
restore.description: Restore a snapshot of the media player.

play_sound.name: Play system sound
play_sound.description: Playback a system sounds. The sound gets mixed into potentially played media.

room_names.name: Room
room_names.description: Room name for the playback of the system sound.
